textContent:
Mint leaves
2 oz. Dark Rum
1 oz. lemon juice
0.5 oz. simple syrup
2 dashes Bitters
2oz Ginger Beer or Diet Ginger Beer
1 Strawberry
Lime Slice

Muddle strawberry with simple syrup and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker. 
Fill shaker with ice and add rum. 
Shake and strain over ice. 
Top with ginger beer and two dashes of bitters. 
Garnish with a slice of lime.
title: Black Barrel Mule
